story.body:
TrueVault is looking for a part-time Engineer Scout who can help us find engineers that fit the specific skills/experience profile we are looking for.

* You are/were an engineer. 
* You have hired other engineers before.
* You have at least 10hr a week to help us.
* You will NOT need to contact any engineers on our behalf.

If you are interested, please email us at cto at truevault.com

Cheers!

Team TrueVault
story.title: TrueVault is looking for a part-time Engineer Scout
